field.property: CheckBox;?Caption= Height=2 Name= Width=4 X=1 Y=1 Input=$sync.category

field.output: Synchronize changes back to legacy category tables
field.property: Label;Caption=Synchronize changes back to legacy category tables Bold=1 Height=2 Name= Width=96 X=5 Y=1

field.output: The Process Designer-based Incident and Service Desk modules use different categorization tables to the SM classic modules.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=The Process Designer-based Incident and Service Desk modules use different categorization tables to the SM classic modules. Height=3 Name= Width=180 X=5 Y=3

field.output: Select this option to synchronize changes in the Process Designer-based category tables back to the legacy category tables (such as category, subcategory, and product type). This is necessary if you run reports on legacy category tables or if interfaces rely on data in these legacy tables. For more details please refer to the upgrade documentation.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=Select this option to synchronize changes in the Process Designer-based category tables back to the legacy category tables (such as category, subcategory, and product type). This is necessary if you run reports on legacy category tables or if interfaces rely on data in these legacy tables. For more details please refer to the upgrade documentation. Height=5 Name= Width=180 X=5 Y=6
